name: Shuhu's Gift
simple_desc: When Blade's HP decreases, gains 1 stack of Charge. Upon reaching maximum Charge, launches Follow-up ATK, dealing Wind DMG to all enemies, restoring HP, and consuming all Charges.
desc:
When Blade sustains DMG or consumes his HP, he gains 1 stack of Charge, stacking up to 5 times. A max of 1 Charge stack can be gained every time he is attacked.
When Charge stack reaches maximum, immediately launches a follow-up attack on all enemies, dealing Wind DMG equal to #2[i]% of Blade's ATK plus #4[i]% of his Max HP. At the same time, restores Blade's HP by #3[i]% of his Max HP. After the follow-up attack, all Charges are consumed.
